title: Model Definition
description: Metadata subobject for a model definition, such as links to code, algorithms, or neural network topologies. This subobject corresponds to the development stage (pre-training) of the model lifecycle.

code.description: Collection of code objects that define model. May include repositories, algorithms, network topologies, etc.

topology.description: Higher-level description of network toplogy or machine learning approaches that model employs.

allOf.description: JSON Schema for input data that model definition may expect, such as what format and dimensions the training dataset looks like.
JSON Schema for output data that a model definition may output, such as what format and dimensions the prediction result looks like.
JSON Schema for hyperparameters that a model definition may make use of, such as batch size, learning rate, etc.

license.description: Type of license model code is released under.
